name: Dominion (itch) (shootboots)
description:
The instability of the green cells growth has led to an explosive dominion over the lands. To fight fire with fire we must also bring forth exponential growth.

NOTE: YOU SHOULD PLAY WITH MOUSE OTHERWISE YOU CANNOT MOVE THE CAMERA

If you have also joined the Ludum Dare 49, please go and rate my game if you have played it :)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/dominion

You can move the camera by pressing and holding the scroll wheel and then moving the mouse.

1st button: Creates 2 default sized cells. Does not destroy current cell

2nd button: Creates 8 smaller dead cells that still contribute to total cell count. Destroys current cell

3rd button: Increases cell size by 50%

4th button: Creates 14 smaller cells over a period of time. Each smaller cell takes a bit of the size of the current cell

5th button: Creates explosion force for surrounding cells

6th button: Sends current cell forward with moderate amount of force

7th button: Sends EVERY cell under your command foward with great force. Great for rushing the opponent

I recommend playing around with the controls first because I didn't have enough time for an in game tutorial. SORRY :(
